column5: Dolphin House is close to the beach, restaurants, and nightlife. Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families.  Lovingly restored 1915 raised bungalow a quick and easy five block walk from Galveston's seawall / beach.   Fully remodeled 1,015 square feet - 2 bedrooms with queen size beds and televisions. Our spa-like bath with large custom walk-in shower with tropical rain head option will help wash away the tension. Fully appointed kitchen.
